# Letura de datos

```{r datos_fuente}
data.vg.raw <- read.csv(here::here("data", "vgsales.csv"))

str(data.vg.raw)
```
# TransformaciÃ³n de los datos

```{r}
data.vg.raw$Year <- as.integer(data.vg.raw$Year)
data.vg.raw$Genre <- as.factor(data.vg.raw$Genre)
data.vg.raw$Platform <- as.factor(data.vg.raw$Platform)
data.vg.raw$Publisher <- as.factor(data.vg.raw$Publisher)

```
```{r}
summary(data.vg.raw)
```
```{r}
str(data.vg.raw)
unique(data.vg.raw$Year)

```

